div.head: Thing that does not release
div.ab: One needs to cut it to make it burn in the mold, but cut it with chisels in one go, in order that the blood does not fall on the mold & does not create filth, which, once reheated, is difficult to remove. Next, put your mold in the oven or similar heat, in order that it dries promptly & retracts before making a crust or mold on the mold.

+
When you mold small female lizards and you want to uncover the part first molded, begin to uncover the heads & you will recognize its place by the pin. Do not attempt to uncover the legs until you have uncovered the rest of the body, in order that the stripped body, as it moves, does not remove the legs from their place, where it is vexing to put them back. When you remove the little points which hold the legs, fix them & press them with something, in order that, when removing the pin, they are not removed from their place, or, in the end, you can put them back with some wax.
